Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION
REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION

Title: Prohibits waivers for nominees to the office of chancellor of NYC school districts
Summary: Prohibits waivers for nominees to the office of chancellor of the NYC school district.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to New York city school district superintendent waivers by the commissioner of education
